description.value:
You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.All-Around Vision] until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Watchful Gaze]

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
